race I.name: Title Race: -Trash Collector-
race I.description: A race to see who gets the -Trash Collector- title first!

affection I.name: Affection Contest: -006-Jigglypuff-
affection I.description: Raise your affection with a basic Jigglypuff and who ever has the highest at the end of the event wins!
affection I.rewards: A refund of all SHARDS and GEMS used to level, +1 level of SHARDS/GEMS, 200 POKEDOLLARS
